name: Elasto Mania II
description:
THE QUIRKY SECOND CHAPTER

Elasto Mania II was released in 2017 as a successor to cult classic Elasto Mania and Action SuperCross. The long-awaited sequel is still a 2D enduro simulator with a nostalgic feel, but it’s also about giving you more bang for your buck than ever, with more challenges, extra collectibles, updated physics and new graphics.

TAKE IT EASY OR TAKE IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL

Will you sit back and enjoy a quick game between two conference calls? Or will you challenge yourself at 2 A.M. until you see your name on top? Explore the Steam Workshop for extra challenges like the Official Level Pack, compete with other Elasto Maniacs on the Leaderboard or just take it easy and have fun with it. Wherever you want to go, Elasto Mania II will take you there.

UNLEASH THE GAME DESIGNER BEAST INSIDE

Elasto Mania is all about community and creativity. After you nailed all 32 levels, let your creative juices flow and build your own levels in the level editor. Don’t forget to share them on the Workshop and let everyone enjoy your creations!
